name: aircrack_ng
desc:
Aircrack-ng is a complete suite of tools to assess WiFi network 
security.
It focuses on different areas of WiFi security:
Monitoring: Packet capture and export of data to text files for further 
processing by third party tools
Attacking: Replay attacks, deauthentication, fake access points and 
others via packet injection
Testing: Checking WiFi cards and driver capabilities 
(capture and injection)Cracking: WEP and WPA PSK (WPA 1 and 2)
